Package com.projecttango.unibw.graphmapper.floorplan

A simple demo application showing how to build a 2d floor plan for indoor navigation purpose using Tango.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GraphBuilder
    Builder that knows how to build and scale a Hallway, Room, Entrypoint, Obstacle or Marker given a list of WallMeasurements.
    GraphmapperActivity
    A small demo application that allows the user to create a navigation graph of indoor environments and a 2D floor plan of a building.
    GraphmapperRenderer
    Very simple augmented reality visialization which displays cubes fixed in place for every WallMeasurement.
    WallMeasurement
    Measurement representation of wall as a measured plane.

Package com.projecttango.unibw.graphmapper.floorplan Description

A simple demo application showing how to build a 2d floor plan for indoor navigation purpose using Tango. It is based on the Java Floorplan example. This package contains the classes for measuring and building the plan and also for displaying it on the tablet.

Icon "Graphmapper" of this project / application:
